entry.para: The watermark module provides a way to render an vector-based overlay onto your image. Watermarks are standard SVG documents and can be designed using Inkscape. The SVG processor of darktable also substitutes strings within the SVG document which gives the oppurtunity to include image dependent information in the watermark such as aperture, exposure time and other metadata.

sect4.title: marker
sect4.para: Choose the watermark of interest, use the reload button next to the combobox to update list with newly added watermarks.

sect4.title: opacity
sect4.para: Set the opacity of the render of watermark.

sect4.title: alignment
sect4.para: Use these controls to align the watermark to any edge or center of the image.

sect4.title: x offset
sect4.para: Pixel-independent offset realtive to the choice of alignment on x-axis.

sect4.title: y offset
sect4.para: Pixel-independent offset relative to the choice of alignment on y-axis.
